Algorithm.name: HdbShiftRating
Algorithm.Comment:
Implements the Shift and Rating Table Lookups from the database. Independent value is called "indep". Dependent values are "shift" and "dep". Shift may or may not be stored in the database
By default, uses a shift input in the "singleShift" property. If variableShift is defined as true, then uses a rating algorithm from the database to find the shift.
Default value for shiftTableType is "Stage Shift" which will linearly interpolate shifts from a single shift table. Other options are: Time Interpolated Shift: lookup shifts separated in time, do linear interpolations in time. Time Interpolated Variable Shift: linear interpolate shifts from stage, do linear interpolations in time from the resulting shifts
The shift, if any, is added to the indep value, and then the dep value is found via a "Stage Flow" rating table type.
